decision_conditions: Condition : 3 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL01 C, PL04 C, PL05 A, PL06 B, PL07, SV01, SV02, SV03, SV04, SV05, SV06, SV01 A, SV02 A, SV03 A, SV04 A, SV06 A, SV05 A, PL01 D, PL04 D, PL06 C, PL07 A, PL05 B, Flood Risk Assessment) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Retrospective application for erection of a single storey rear extension to the house
